Package org.waarp.common.filemonitor

This package would like to propose a JSE 6 compatible way to scan a directory for new, deleted and changed files, in order to allow some functions like pooling a directory before actions.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileMonitorCommandFactory
    Factory for FileMonitorCommandRunnableFuture
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileMonitor
    This package would like to propose a JSE 6 compatible way to scan a directory for new, deleted and changed files, in order to allow some functions like pooling a directory before actions.
    FileMonitor.FileItem
    One element in the directory
    FileMonitor.FileMonitorInformation
    Used by Waarp Business information
    FileMonitor.FileMonitorTimerTask
    Timer task
    FileMonitorCommandRunnableFuture
    Command run when a new file item is validated
    RegexFileFilter
    Example of FileFilter using regex on filename and possible Size
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FileMonitor.Status  

Package org.waarp.common.filemonitor Description

This package would like to propose a JSE 6 compatible way to scan a directory for new, deleted and changed files, in order to allow some functions like pooling a directory before actions.
